title: "police"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(anytime)
NYPD <- read.csv("NYPD_williamsburg.csv") 
all <- subset(NYPD, select = c(1, 2)) %>%
  group_by(Yr_Month, OFNS_DESC) %>% tally() %>%
  dcast(Yr_Month~OFNS_DESC)
nnall <- all[, colSums(is.na(all)) == 0]
some <- subset(NYPD, select = c(1, 3)) %>%
  group_by(Yr_Month, LAW_CAT_CD) %>% tally() %>%
  dcast(Yr_Month~LAW_CAT_CD)
some <- some[, colSums(is.na(some)) == 0]


```
